name: ROBFEOY
description:
◆ Explanation ◆
A certain MMO Paro RPG, the latest work of the ROBF series, the battle is a familiar sex battle method.
This is the final part of the series trilogy, but it is a content that you can enjoy even if you do not have knowledge of the previous work or the original game.

◆ System ◆
The battle is a turn-based RPG based on the sex battle rule that "the one who hits first loses".
Nearly 100 new skills have been added, and the number of quests and game volume have more than doubled from past games.

◆ Animation ◆
The animation part, which is also the attractive part of the series, is also powered up
We use more than 15,000 sheets in total.
Please see the sample video for details.

◆ Story ◆
The hero who defeated the Demon King Dark Road on the southern continent is
In search of clues to his master, he travels to the northern continent of Schwarzwald ...
However, the strength of the monsters there was not comparable to that of the South!

Completed training in Aldebaran to counter the northern monsters
The incident that happened before the main character ... What is the destination?
